articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: Gmail preparing voice input for AI tools - 9to5Google
articles.description: Gmail appears to be working on support for voice input when using its AI tool "Help me Write," but it's unclear when it will be available.
articles.content:
As Google continues to roll out more AI features, Gmail for Android appears to be close to releasing a neat option that uses voice input and AI to help you draft an email.
“Help me write” arrived in… [+981 chars]

articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.title: Gorgeous images show Axiom-3 crew over Himalayas on ISS approach - Digital Trends
articles.description: Astronauts aboard the ISS have shared dramatic imagery of the Axiom-3 Crew Dragon as it approached the station on Saturday.
articles.content:
A SpaceX Crew Dragon approaching the ISS in the Axiom-3 mission.NASA
